# 1907 Swarthmore Quakers football team

The 1907 Swarthmore Quakers football team was an American football team that represented Swarthmore College as an independent during the 1907 college football season. The team compiled a 6â€“2 record and outscored opponents by a total of 150 to 53. George H. Brooke was the head coach.
